attributes.action: make heating allowances in winter available to disabled people of all ages and not just to the elderly
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Elderly people are given heating allowances in winter because they find it very difficult to move around and generate their own body heat, unfortunately if you are disabled but under the required age NO extra payments are made, meaning a lot of severely disabled people are left to cope with the cold weather and suffering cold related illnessess, which in the long run are NOT cost effective.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
